workflow.name: Personalized outreach for lawyers with LinkedIn scraping, GPT-4o, Google Sheets
workflow.description:
![Screenshot 20250612 120714.png](fileId:1513)
 ‚ö†Ô∏è This template uses only official n8n nodes. No community nodes required.

## üßë‚Äçüíº Who is this for?

This workflow is designed for:
- Legal tech founders
- Marketing freelancers or consultants
- Agencies supporting lawyers and small law firms
- Anyone doing outbound outreach in the legal niche

## ‚ùì What problem is this solving?

LinkedIn is a goldmine for targeting legal professionals ‚Äî but scraping and personalizing outreach is tedious and expensive. Most tools either:
- Require paid LinkedIn Sales Navigator
- Can‚Äôt personalize at scale
- Violate LinkedIn‚Äôs TOS

This workflow solves that by using **free Google Search**, **OpenRouter AI**, and **GPT-4o** to find, enrich, and message up to **1,000 solo lawyers per day** ‚Äî without using browser automation or scrapers.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è What this workflow does

1. Uses **Google Programmable Search** to find solo lawyers and small firm founders on LinkedIn
2. Parses each profile‚Äôs name, title, profile URL, and snippet
3. Saves raw lead data to Google Sheets
4. Uses **OpenRouter Sonar Pro** to enrich each profile with external content
5. Generates a personalized, 1-line message using **GPT-4o**
6. Appends the final message into Google Sheets for outreach

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup

Estimated time: **15‚Äì20 minutes**

### ‚úÖ Google Programmable Search
- Enable the Custom Search API on Google Cloud
- Create a programmable search engine set to search the full web
- Copy your `API key` and `CX ID`

### ‚úÖ Google Sheets
- Create a sheet with columns: `Name`, `Title`, `Profile URL`, `Outreach Message`
- Share the sheet with your OAuth-connected Google account

### ‚úÖ OpenRouter
- Sign up at [openrouter.ai](https://openrouter.ai)
- Fund with at least $5 and generate your API key
- Use the model `perplexity/sonar-pro` for real-time research

### ‚úÖ GPT-4o (optional)
- You can use your OpenAI key or route GPT-4o via OpenRouter

All setup-specific values are marked clearly in sticky notes and placeholders.

---

## üõ†Ô∏è How to customize this workflow to your needs

- Change the Google search query to match your industry (e.g., `"founder" AND "therapist" site:linkedin.com/in`)
- Modify the AI prompt to match your tone (formal, casual, humorous)
- Connect the final output to your CRM (like HubSpot, Airtable, etc.)
- Add a second outreach message variant to A/B test performance

---

## üìå Sticky Notes & Annotations

- All nodes are clearly renamed for understandability (e.g., `Find Lawyer Profiles`, `Parse LinkedIn Search Results`)
- Color-coded sticky notes explain:
  - Setup instructions
  - Required credentials
  - Use case![Screenshot 20250612 113505.png](fileId:1511)

---

## üóÇ Category

- AI
- Sales
- Marketing

options.systemMessage: Your job is to research this lawyer or law firm founder as much as possible. The goal is to find relevant public information to help generate personalized outreach. This workflow is targeting solo practice lawyers and small law firms ‚Äî not large firms or government attorneys. Avoid irrelevant sources. Focus on anything that reflects their legal focus (e.g., family law, criminal defense, small business law), local community involvement, or their firm‚Äôs branding. Include source references (e.g., LinkedIn posts, website articles, etc.). No intros or conclusions.

parameters.name: q
parameters.value: ("solo practitioner" OR "founder" OR "managing partner") lawyer "law firm" site:linkedin.com/in -government -gov -biglaw

values.content: Your job is to create a short, personalized outreach icebreaker for solo lawyers or small law firm owners. Keep it genuine, professional, and brief ‚Äî one line max. You may refer to their practice area, years in practice, recent content, community involvement, or anything that reflects their personal brand. Avoid generic statements. Do not ask about location. Do not mention large law firms or government service. Use a business-casual tone, and start with: "Hey [name] ..."

user.name: Ibrahim Malick
user.bio: Automation expert, AI instructor, and founder of The Digital Tutor. I help solopreneurs and service-based businesses streamline lead generation using n8n, AI, and no-code tools. Would you like to customize this workflow or build your own? Connect with me at https://thedigitaltutor.net.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
